title: Handfake

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Goomba Sign**: Choose a target to frame as a Koopa role of your choice until the next time a investigate action targets them.
- **Parakoopa Sign**: Twirl it to redirect all of visitors of a target into a random non-Koopa player.
- **Bob-omb Sign** Choose a target, if they are killed, Deal an Unstoppable attack to a random player who killed them.
- **Bowser sign**: You will allow all Koopas to talk in the faction chat until the end of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All your abilities have 1 use, once per game you will get an extra use of all abilities if you used them all.
- All twirled players are redirected to different targets.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 3052
*A creature shaped as a hand but made of black ooze, it holds signs with pictures of various enemies on them.*
